text.div:
ConceptMapUKCoreAdministrativeGender (https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/ConceptMap/UKCore-AdministrativeGender-1-0-0)

Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender to https://fhir.nhs.uk/R4/ValueSet/UKCore-NHSDataDictionary-PersonStatedGender-1-0-0

DRAFT. Published on 18-Oct-2019 13:00:00 by NHS Digital. Copyright © 2019 NHS Digital

A Concept Map from ValueSet Administrative Gender to NHS Data Dictionary Person Stated Gender to aid interpretation.


Source CodeRelationshipDestination Code
maleequivalent1 (Male)
femaleequivalent2 (Female)
otherequivalent9 (Indeterminate (unable to be classified as either male or female))
unknownequivalentX (Not Known (not recorded))

target.display: Indeterminate (unable to be classified as either male or female)
